description.text: Abjuration: resistance. Conjuration: create water, stabilize. Divination: detect magic, detect poison, detect psychic significance*, guidance, know direction, read magic, sift. Enchantment: daze. Evocation: dancing lights, flare, light, spark, telekinetic projectile*. Illusion: ghost sound. Necromancy: bleed, grave words*, touch of fatigue. Transmutation: mage hand, mending, message, open/close, purify food and drink.
